django.core.files.uploadedfile

Classes representing uploaded files.

Classes

UploadedFile

An abstract uploaded file (TemporaryUploadedFile and

TemporaryUploadedFile

A file uploaded to a temporary location (i.e. stream-to-disk).

InMemoryUploadedFile

A file uploaded into memory (i.e. stream-to-memory).

SimpleUploadedFile

A simple representation of a file, which just has content, size, and a name.

Module Contents

class django.core.files.uploadedfile.UploadedFile(file=None, name=None, content_type=None, size=None, charset=None, content_type_extra=None)[source]

Bases: django.core.files.base.File

An abstract uploaded file (TemporaryUploadedFile and InMemoryUploadedFile are the built-in concrete subclasses).

An UploadedFile object behaves somewhat like a file object and represents some file data that the user submitted with a form.
